questions: Can you provide an example of a complex SQL query you have written to implement a business requirement in your previous projects?
How have you utilized DML and DDL operations to meet specific business requirements in your experience as an Oracle Developer?
What experience do you have in resolving production issues by modifying backend codes as needed?
How have you contributed to the development of backend code, including altering tables, adding new columns, constraints, sequences, and indexes based on business requirements?
Can you explain your role in creating procedures, functions, triggers, and views in your Oracle projects?
How have you utilized SQL*Loader in loading data into different tables in your projects?
How have you coordinated with DBAs to improve database performance in your previous roles?
Can you discuss a specific instance where you enhanced current functionality to improve system performance in a project?
How do you approach gathering requirements from business users and analyzing them to implement in your projects?
Can you provide an example of a project where you worked on change/business requirements and how you handled the analysis and resolution of production incidents?
